long_description: The Yakima FarOut Pro cargo bag expands from 9 to 12 cu. ft. of storage. Low-profile, aerodynamic bag attaches to any roof top for a quick and easy weekend escape. Made of PVC-free, heavy-duty waterproof fabric and taped seams to keep contents dry and clean. Padded anti-skid bottom protects the roof of your car from bulky and pointy items in cargo bag. Yakima FarOut Pro cargo bag features steel-reinforced installation hooks. Fits round, square and most factory crossbars, as well as naked roofs; includes straps. Bag folds up for easy storage when not needed.
short_description: The Yakima FarOut Pro cargo bag expands from 9 to 12 cu. ft. of storage. Low-profile, aerodynamic bag attaches to any roof top for a quick and easy weekend escape.
